title: The top-down view of your champion.
body:
I was just playing and i feel like you need to be able to see more of your surroundings instead of moving your mouse all over the screen while auto-attacking champions.

An adjustable option in the menu would be fine as well as the middle mouse scroll.

This would be a lot better in team fights, especially as _ADC_ or _Mage_ when you have to be on the outside of fights.

replies.body: I'm not getting what you're asking?
Basicly being able to zoom out more
